document.full_text: the united states on saturday equaled the record for deaths from tornadoes in a single year with 519 killed in 2011, and more than a month still to go in the tornado season, the national weather service said.
document.title: 2011 equals deadliest u.s. tornado year on record
lines_and_colors: the united states on saturday equaled the record for deaths from tornadoes in a single year with 519 killed in 2011, and more than a month still to go in the tornado season, the national weather service said.
